institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 36 (Calculation of training performance, etc.)
contents: Article 36 (Calculation of training performance, etc.) ① The training performance of the joint training center is calculated based on the numbers registered in HRD-Net as of the last day of each month. ② If necessary, the Corporation may require the joint training center to submit training results, etc. in accordance with the “National Human Resources Development Consortium Project Promotion Performance” format in Form No. 9 of the Business Manual.
